title: Long term employment
creator_credit: Michael Farquhar and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: Michael Farquhar walked into Brintons to leave his details at reception. The same day he had and interview and got a job. In his time there, he moved through many different areas and went through many life changes, from renting an appartment to marriage, owning a home and raising a family. When Brintons closed in 2008, Michael had worked there for 21 years. He talks about what it was like to work there, in the good and bad times.
